alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:03PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ashtabula County through 545 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Geneva, or near Geneva-On-The-Lake, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Orwell, Andover, Austinburg, Roaming Shores, Cherry Valley, Rock Creek, Edgewood and Plymouth Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
